comment:
beam bridge:A type of bridge structure that is supported by beams, typically made of Popsicle sticks in this competition.
truss bridge:A type of bridge structure that is supported by a framework of triangles, typically made of Popsicle sticks in this competition.
maximize total mass:To optimize the total weight that can be supported by building the right combination of beam and truss bridges within the given constraints of Popsicle sticks and glue.
